editorialNotes.standard: Football, soccer, basketball, baseball, cricket, Formula 1, tennis, golf, boxing, mixed martial arts. Regardless of what sports you follow, the ESPN app can keep you in the loop with up-to-the-minute scores, breaking news on signings and trades, and insightful analysis on matchups and drafts.

editorialNotes.short: Subscribe to watch the season live.

editorialNotes.standard: We were hoping to avoid making baseball puns, but here’s the problem: The MLB app really does knock it out of the park. It’s a great way to preview the day’s matchups, buy tickets to a game, and follow along via live pitch tracking and high-resolution ballpark renderings.

ios.subtitle: Live Scores & Stats in One Tap

editorialNotes.standard: It’s a social network for anglers. That means lots of people posting pictures of themselves with shockingly giant halibut—and it also means the app is packed to the, uh, gills with tips on local hot spots, advice on bait and gear, and even the ability to ID any fish you’ve caught simply by snapping a photo of it.

editorialNotes.short: Follow every game, every goal and every stat.

editorialNotes.standard: If you want to play fantasy sports, there are—ahem—leagues of apps to choose from. But we think ESPN Fantasy might be the MVP. Its minimal interface stays out of our way so we can focus on draft picks, trades, and managing our lineup. But the best part? ESPN’s got mini-stories on all of the hot prospects. So the more time we spend actually using the app, the better our team ends up.

We’re huge fans of The Athletic, which combines up-to-the-minute live scores and an unmatched level of in-depth reporting to provide a haven for sports supporters across leagues. Follow your favorite teams and reporters to read up on the latest news, then dive deep into The Athletic’s original podcasts and live streams to become an expert.

editorialNotes.tagline: Replay full games with Game Pass
editorialNotes.standard: The ultimate app for any football fan, NFL Mobile offers an insanely robust experience from the preseason to the playoffs. A smartly designed interface puts the spotlight on colorful photos and videos, and breaking news is easy to navigate and share. The astoundingly long list of features includes drive charts, real-time scores, and live stat trackers. Plus, on-demand games, access to preseason games, and more all become available with purchase of the NFL Game Pass 2016 Subscription, so there’s always something new to watch, analyze, and read.

editorialNotes.standard: If you play basketball, HomeCourt can change your game for the better. It uses your iPhone’s and iPad’s cameras and sensors plus its own proprietary AI technology to analyze your jumper—no extra hardware or gadgets required. Just set up the app, point your device toward the court, shoot the ball, and get real-time shot tracking and analysis.
